item.title: CVE-2024-32094|2024-04-15T08:58:13.289Z -- ChurchThemes -- Church Content – Sermons, Events and More
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ChurchThemes Church Content – Sermons, Events and More.This issue affects Church Content – Sermons, Events and More: from n/a through 2.6.
